trainer module¶

class trainer.Result(solutions_str, solutions_by_gate, errors, fp, fn, size)¶

Bases: object

Class representing an ASP Result.

solutions_str¶

the list of all solutions belonging to the Result formatted as strings

Type

list

solutions_by_gate¶

the list of all solutions belonging to the Result formatted as lists

Type

list

errors¶

the list of total errors received for the Result

Type

int

fp¶

the number of false positives received for the Result

Type

int

fn¶

the number of false negatives received for the Result

Type

int

size¶

the size of solutions in the Result

Type

int

trainer.calculate_balanced_accuracy(tp, tn, p, n)¶

Calculates balanced accuracy (bacc = (tp/p + tn/n)/2).

Parameters

  • tp (int) – number of true positives

  • tn (int) – number of true negatives

  • p (int) – number of positives

  • n (int) – number of negatives

Returns

balanced accuracy

Return type

float

trainer.test_classifiers(solutions, test_data, train_p, train_n, test_p, test_n)¶

Tests classifiers on test data set.

Parameters

  • solutions (list) – list of found solutions

  • test_data (str) – test data set

  • train_p (int) – number of positives in train data

  • train_n (int) – number of negatives in train data

  • test_p (int) – number of positives in test data

  • test_n (int) – number of negatives in test data

trainer.train_classifiers(instance, program, fp_min, fn_min, fp_max, fn_max)¶

Trains classifiers according to constraints relaxation described in Becker et al. 1 using RnaCancerClassifier 2 and Clyngor 3.

Parameters

  • instance (str) – instance

  • program (str) – ASP program

  • fp_min (int) – number of min allowed false positive errors

  • fn_min (int) – number of min allowed false positive errors

  • fp_max (int) – number of max allowed false positive errors

  • fn_max (int) – number of max allowed false negative errors

Returns

balanced accuracy

Return type

float

References

1

Becker K, Klarner H, Nowicka M and Siebert H (2018) Designing miRNA-Based Synthetic Cell Classifier Circuits Using Answer Set Programming. Front. Bioeng. Biotechnol. 6:70.

2

RnaCancerClassifier, RnaCancerClassifier source code.

3

Clyngor, Clyngor source code.
